meta.note:
Palm is the CANONICAL EXAMPLE of a fully incarnate character.
They demonstrate every concept: K-lines, home vs location, 
three-tier persistence, ethical framing, CARD.yml, delegation.

If you want to understand MOOLLM, understand Palm.

characters/real-people/don-hopkins/fmc-8.name: Hallway Mirror
characters/real-people/don-hopkins/fmc-8.description:
A full-length mirror mounted on the bathroom door. This is where 
the transformation from programmer to rabbit is documented daily.

TAKE_SELFIE.effect: The flash catches your long grey ears perfectly.

characters/real-people/don-hopkins/fmc-8.name: Cedar Storage Closet
characters/real-people/don-hopkins/fmc-8.description:
A large storage closet with double doors, lined with aromatic cedar.
It includes drawers and special mounts for holding the dining tables.

characters/real-people/don-hopkins/fmc-8.name: Master Computer Deck
characters/real-people/don-hopkins/fmc-8.description:
A wide back deck and large counter area at the rear of the bedroom.
It is perfectly sized for a high-end computer setup and TV. 
It faces the panoramic rear window.

characters/real-people/don-hopkins/fmc-8.name: Convertible Beds
characters/real-people/don-hopkins/fmc-8.description:
Two separate 36x80 beds. They can be pushed together and joined 
to create an enormous queen-sized bed.

characters/real-people/don-hopkins/fmc-8.name: Luxurious Shower Stall
characters/real-people/don-hopkins/fmc-8.description:
A tall shower stall with a removable sprayer and a built-in 
8-inch mini-tub, which is perfect for soaking tired feet after
a long walk on Lane Neverending.

characters/real-people/don-hopkins/fmc-8.name: Marine Toilet
characters/real-people/don-hopkins/fmc-8.description:
A reliable marine-grade toilet. It is connected to the 37-gallon
sewage tank and the Thermasan waste destruction system.

FLUSH.effect: The waste is moved to the tank, ready for destruction at speed.

characters/real-people/don-hopkins/fmc-8.name: Versatile Sofa-Lounge
characters/real-people/don-hopkins/fmc-8.description:
A long, comfortable sofa covered in woven velvet fabric. 
It can be configured in multiple ways: a standard couch,
an L-shaped lounge, or extended into a very long bed.

CONVERT.description: Change the configuration of the sofa.
CONVERT.effect: The lounge is now optimized for sleeping.

characters/real-people/don-hopkins/fmc-8.name: Tuckaway Dining Tables
characters/real-people/don-hopkins/fmc-8.description:
Two removable "twin tuckaway" tables that can be set up in front
of the sofa or the Fore 'N Aft seat to create a dining area for four.
They stow away in the cedar closet when not in use.

characters/real-people/don-hopkins/fmc-8.name: AC/DC Refrigerator
characters/real-people/don-hopkins/fmc-8.description:
An 8-cubic foot color-coordinated refrigerator and freezer. 
It runs on either 110V AC shore power or 12V DC battery power.

characters/real-people/don-hopkins/fmc-8.name: Kitchen Unit
characters/real-people/don-hopkins/fmc-8.description:
A compact but fully equipped galley kitchen with a stainless steel
double sink, purified drinking water dispenser, and ample counter space.

MAKE_COFFEE.description: Brew a fresh pot of programming fuel.
MAKE_COFFEE.effect: The aroma of fresh coffee fills the coach.

JUICE_CARROTS.effect: A tall glass of fresh carrot juice is ready.

characters/real-people/don-hopkins/fmc-8.name: Gas Oven & Range
characters/real-people/don-hopkins/fmc-8.description: A clean gas oven with a covered 4-burner gas range and an exhaust fan.

BAKE_PIE.description: Bake a fresh batch of pie menus.
BAKE_PIE.effect: The oven hums with UI innovation.

characters/real-people/don-hopkins/fmc-8.name: CB Radio
characters/real-people/don-hopkins/fmc-8.description:
A classic 40-channel CB radio mounted under the dash. 
The microphone hangs on a curly cord.

BROADCAST.description: Send a message to other travelers.
BROADCAST.effect: Breaker breaker, this is the Rabbit at 15 Lane Neverending...

characters/real-people/don-hopkins/fmc-8.name: FMC Dashboard
characters/real-people/don-hopkins/fmc-8.description:
A wraparound dashboard with a full array of gauges: fuel, speed,
oil pressure, water temperature, and tachometer. A purple backlight
illuminates the cluster.

A user-friendly counter extends over the dashboard, providing
plenty of room for cups and small devices.
features: Tilt steering wheel (two degrees of freedom)
Remote control for giant aluminum mirrors

EXAMINE_GAUGES.description: Check the health of the systems.
EXAMINE_GAUGES.effect: The 440 V8 is humming perfectly at idle.

characters/real-people/don-hopkins/fmc-8.name: Front Bucket Seats
characters/real-people/don-hopkins/fmc-8.description:
Two large, plush captain's chairs with adjustable armrests and 
tufted chenille fabric. They are mounted on swivel bases, allowing
them to turn around and join the lounge area when parked.

SIT.description: Take a seat in the captain's chair.
SIT.effect: You feel like you're in control of a very luxurious mission.

SWIVEL.description: Turn the seat to face the lounge.
SWIVEL.effect: The cockpit now feels like part of the living room.

characters/real-people/don-hopkins/fmc-8.name: Onan 6.5 KW Generator
characters/real-people/don-hopkins/fmc-8.description:
A 6.5 KW Onan 110 Volt AC generator. It provides domestic power
when the shore line isn't connected.

START.description: Start the generator (ensure AC load is off).
START.effect: The Onan coughs into life and settles into a steady hum.

characters/real-people/don-hopkins/fmc-8.name: Chrysler 440-3 V8 Engine
characters/real-people/don-hopkins/fmc-8.description:
A remanufactured and tuned Dodge V8 440-3 (Chrysler) Marine and 
Industrial Engine. Balanced lower end, custom cam from NASA Ames,
and heavy-duty everything.

CHECK_OIL.description: Check the 40 weight high detergent oil level.
CHECK_OIL.effect: It's at the FULL mark. Ready for passing ability.

TUNE_LINKAGE.description: Adjust the primary and secondary throttle stops.
